text: List of subcamps of the Kraków-Płaszów complex of Nazi concentration camps near Kraków, General Government, in occupied Poland between 1942–1944. #Kraków Prokocim (Julag II), established March 1943 at the former "Kabel" plant, 75 Prokocimska street. Obóz pracy przymusowej przy ul. Prokocimskiej 75 #Kraków Bieżanów (Julag III) #Kraków Zabłocie, Oskar Schindler's "Deutsche Emailwaren- Fabrik", former "Rekord" plant, 4 Lipowa street. Fabryka Oskara Schindlera #Kraków Liban, a quarry (Liban & Ehrenpreis) #Mielec #Wieliczka #Zakopane ==References== Category:Lists of Nazi concentration camps * Category:Poland- related lists
title: Kraków-Płaszów concentration camp
